flavors.name: Almond Brittle Fudge
flavors.summary: PLANT-BASED. VEGAN. CONTAINS NUTS. CONTAINS SOY. GLUTEN-FREE.
flavors.description: This flavour is full of crunchy brittle candy pieces that are made from crushed almonds, cacao nibs, dairy-free chocolate, and chia seeds. We are a proponent of integrating more whole foods into our overall diet and these good-for-you ingredients are so you can satisfy your sweet tooth on a positive note!

flavors.name: Baklava
flavors.summary: PLANT-BASED. VEGAN. CONTAINS NUTS. CONTAINS GLUTEN.
flavors.description: Our decadent Baklava flavour is like the actual dessert in an ice cream form. Our homemade Baklava is packed with buttery, flaky filo pastry, walnuts, nutmeg, and pistachios crushed into our classic cashew-coconut milk base with cinnamon and maple swirl making it the ultimate dessert for all baklava lovers.
ingredients: Home-made Baklava (Filo Pastry, Walnuts, Pistachios, Lemon & Orange Zest)

flavors.name: Black Forest
flavors.summary: PLANT-BASED. VEGAN. CONTAINS NUTS. CONTAINS SOY. GLUTEN-FREE.
flavors.description: Imagine the popular German cake in the form of ice cream. Rich vegan chocolate brownies and homemade cherry compote are swirled into our classic coconut cashew milk base.

flavors.name: Black Sesame Cookies
flavors.description: We're ushering in the Lunar New Year with our take on traditional Black Sesame Cookies in our coconut-cashew base.

flavors.name: Blue Planet
flavors.summary: PLANT-BASED. VEGAN. CONTAINS NUTS. CONTAINS GLUTEN.
flavors.description: Looks like our beautiful planet when scooped. Our classic coconut cashew vanilla base is naturally coloured blue with butterfly pea flowers, then we fold in fluffy chunks of matcha cake. The slight bitterness of the matcha add depth and balance to the flavour.

flavors.name: Charcoal Vanilla
flavors.description: Experience all of the flavour of our classic vanilla, but with a fun twist. Scoop up gray-black ice cream with the added detoxifying benefits of activated charcoal.

flavors.name: Chocolate Sorbet
flavors.summary: PLANT-BASED. VEGAN. GLUTEN-FREE. TRACES OF NUTS.
flavors.description: Death by chocolate... literally. Rich and creamy without any plant milk.

flavors.name: Coffee Chocolate Fudge Swirl
flavors.summary: PLANT-BASED. VEGAN. CONTAINS NUTS. CONTAINS SOY. GLUTEN-FREE.
flavors.description: A decadent and creamy caffeine treat for our coffee lovers! Our delicious cashew-coconut milk base is packed with the perfect hint of espresso and swirled with ribbons of rich chocolate ganache to give you the ultimate coffee experience. Trust us when we say this would be a good sub for your morning coffee

flavors.name: Durian
flavors.description: Known for its strong odour, the "king of fruits" is fragrant and pleasant for some, while incredibly offensive to others. We blend the creamy flesh into our classic coconut milk base to create this unique flavour.

flavors.name: Keto Avocado Coconut
flavors.summary: PLANT-BASED. VEGAN. GLUTEN-FREE. TRACES OF NUTS.
flavors.description: We have a newcomer to our Keto club! – Our Keto Avocado Coconut could be the key to your heart. Loaded with fresh avocados churned together with coconut milk and sweetened with xylitol – these are not only soy free, nut free and gluten free, but deliciously mild and creamy.

flavors.name: Madagascan Vanilla Bean
flavors.description: As classic as classic can get without the egg.

flavors.name: Passion Fruit Sorbet
flavors.summary: PLANT-BASED. VEGAN. GLUTEN-FREE. TRACES OF NUTS.
flavors.description: It's like you're eating the actual fruit. Enough said.

flavors.name: Peanut Buttercup
flavors.summary: PLANT-BASED. VEGAN. CONTAINS NUTS. CONTAINS SOY. GLUTEN-FREE.
flavors.description: We home make our own version of this popular chocolate candy, crush it, then generously fold it into our classic coconut cashew base and add in some extra roasted peanut chunks.

flavors.name: Pecan Praline
flavors.description: A sweet, nutty, and buttery ice cream packed with crunchy caramelised praline pecans in a cashew and coconut milk base. This is sure to be your new flavour obsession.

flavors.name: Salted Chocolate Chip
flavors.summary: PLANT-BASED. VEGAN. CONTAINS NUTS. CONTAINS SOY. GLUTEN-FREE.
flavors.description: This flavour was created by accident. In our early days, our chef was prepping a batch of Dark Chocolate and accidentally added more salt. But this mistake turned into a win because they tried it and were surprised at how good it tasted!

flavors.name: Strawberry
flavors.summary: PLANT-BASED. VEGAN. GLUTEN-FREE. TRACES OF NUTS.
flavors.description: Can't go wrong with classic flavours. Bursting with Belgian strawberries and bananas blended into our coconut almond milk base.

flavors.name: Virgin Mojito
flavors.description: We're celebrating Dry January with our take on a Virgin Mojito. Refreshing and tart, this sorbet combines lemon and mint for a zesty treat for the new year.

flavors.name: Watermelon Strawberry Mint
flavors.summary: PLANT-BASED. VEGAN. GLUTEN-FREE. TRACES OF NUTS
flavors.description: A fruity combination of fresh watermelon and strawberries paired with a touch of fresh mint for an herbal flair and a hint of lemon for a touch of acidity. Recommended for those hot days when you're seeking something light and refreshing.
